```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
vinyl_data <- read.csv("../data/discogs_vinyl_data_clean_new.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(vinyl_data, aes(x = want, y = price)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10()

```

```{r}
vinyl_data |> summarise(cor(want, price))
```
```{r}
cor.test(vinyl_data$popularity, vinyl_data$price)
```
